Based on the user's preference cues, I would recommend "Lady in the Water" (2006) and "Zero Effect" (1998).
" Lady in the Water ", directed by Kevin Smith, is a dark comedy film that follows the story of Cleveland Heep, an apartment building superintendent who discovers that he has accidentally saved a young woman from her death at the bottom of his pool. As he works to figure out how this young woman from his pool ended up being alive in his hands and what she really wants him to do, Cleveland Heep is joined by his assistant Steve Arlo and their fellow tenants as they all work together to try to help Cleveland Heep figure out what really happened to the young woman from his pool who ended up being alive in his hands and what really wants him to do.
